title: `flag l2.outputroot is required` when run the command in cannon
body:
<!--
Need help?
Refer to our contributing guidelines for additional information about making a good issue:
https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/.github/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md
-->

**Describe the bug**
The readme file in cannon hasn't been updated. 
When I run:
```
./bin/cannon run \
    --pprof.cpu \
    --info-at '%10000000' \
    --proof-at never \
    --input ./state.json \
    -- \
    ../op-program/bin/op-program \
    --network goerli \
    --l1.trustrpc \
    --l1.rpckind debug_geth \
    --l1 https://goerli.infura.io/v3/APIKEY \
    --l2 https://optimism-goerli.infura.io/v3/APIKEY \
    --l1.head 0x204f815790ca3bb43526ad60ebcc64784ec809bdc3550e82b54a0172f981efab \
    --l2.head 0xedc79de4d616a9100fdd42192224580daee81ea3d6303de8089d48a6c1bf4816 \
    --l2.claim 0x530658ab1b1b3ff4829731fc8d5955f0e6b8410db2cd65b572067ba58df1f2b9 \
    --l2.outputroot 0x049d34014b0fc2f09a56065c9e52f3c834eae4a154427da90dde85bc78238802 \
    --l2.blocknumber 8813570 \
    --datadir /tmp/fpp-database \
    --log.format terminal \
    --server
```
It shows the error: `Failed to fetch l2 output`. 
Then I try to find the outputroot in https://goerli.etherscan.io/tx/0xd0ce9e85a749cde761c8b108713c2f3ec1768b8ec5d84788d12886bd19729bb9#eventlog, and run the above cmd with l2.outputroot:

```
./bin/cannon run \
    --pprof.cpu \
    --info-at '%10000000' \
    --proof-at never \
    --input ./state.json \
    -- \
    ../op-program/bin/op-program \
    --network goerli \
    --l1.trustrpc \
    --l1.rpckind debug_geth \
    --l1 https://goerli.infura.io/v3/APIKEY \
    --l2 https://optimism-goerli.infura.io/v3/APIKEY \
    --l1.head 0x204f815790ca3bb43526ad60ebcc64784ec809bdc3550e82b54a0172f981efab \
    --l2.head 0xedc79de4d616a9100fdd42192224580daee81ea3d6303de8089d48a6c1bf4816 \
    --l2.claim 0x530658ab1b1b3ff4829731fc8d5955f0e6b8410db2cd65b572067ba58df1f2b9 \
    --l2.outputroot 0x50F1B8720F44E46519257C5161F70E7C9C793D724FBCF433C4F4C08C7563F1C9 \
    --l2.blocknumber 8813668 \
    --datadir /tmp/fpp-database \
    --log.format terminal \
    --server
```

It shows another warning: `Failed to fetch l2 output   root=50f1b8..63f1c9 err="unknown output root"`
